__e: Sir... Order your man to fire, now!
"I... my kid saw a light, so your soldiers, tell them to drop their duties and..."
Tell your guys to get ready.
Not if you order your men to search the lower decks.
Form a company front behind the wagons. And do that about-turn. - Let's get you mounted.
When that happens, just tell me to go, and I'll go.
If there's anything further I may do, pray command me.
Are you ordering me to stand here and talk to you about this,chief?
When he visits... I have no choice but to obey his commands.
As sure as it is my duty to remain loyal to your command, I also have another duty. To protect those men.
You say you should command, this would make you very happy, To obey all my commands... Nevertheless you are so different from me
You don't need to live your whole life taking commands from old men.
You may command us to make anything for you, or do the work yourself, for pleasure.
I can't order you to lie to the King but you'll be a friend for life if you do.
My family is on this ship and you will follow my orders whether you agree with them or not.
Now you will obey me and come away with me to the land of darkness!
And what makes you think I'm going to obey your command?
One move from his lips, we've to risk our lives
Is that so? Poor you. Don't make me give you orders, then you'd have to fucking turn it off.
So you stay in control and you follow my orders, and I'll decide if you get to be an agent or not.
If for some reason you can't comply with my orders...
Oh, I'm sorry that I don't follow your orders.
You can't order us not to talk to him.
